text:
Mineral Resources Development Revocation Order 1998

I make the following order under section 5(4) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

11 May 1998

JOHN BESWICK

Minister for Mines

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development Revocation Order 1998 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Revocation
    The Mineral Resources Development (Exemption) Order 1996 is revoked.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 15 May 1998

This order is administered in Tasmania Development and Resources.
